channel.title: Scripting News
channel.description: Dave Winer, OG blogger, podcaster, developed first apps in many categories. Old enough to know better. It's even worse than it appears.

image.title: Scripting News
image.description: Scripting News gets an image because it's part of a network that uses them. 6/4/25 by DW

item.description: Why did we need all those programming languages?
item.source:markdown: Why did we need all those programming languages?

source:outline.text: Why did we need all those programming languages?

item.description: Imagine building blocks to assemble your own social web app. A toolkit you could plug into your bot.
item.source:markdown: Imagine building blocks to assemble your own social web app. A toolkit you could plug into your bot.

source:outline.text: Imagine building blocks to assemble your own social web app. A toolkit you could plug into your bot.

item.description: I was surprised to find that nirvana.userland.com, a site that was new in 1998, is still running.
item.source:markdown: I was surprised to find that [nirvana.userland.com](http://nirvana.userland.com/docserver.root/table/uniqueName), a site that was new in 1998, is still running.

source:outline.text: I was surprised to find that nirvana.userland.com, a site that was new in 1998, is still running.

item.description: January is archived, as is 2025. On to the future! :-)
item.source:markdown: [January](https://github.com/scripting/Scripting-News/blob/master/blog/opml/2026/01.opml) is archived, as is [2025](https://github.com/scripting/Scripting-News/tree/master/blog/opml/2025). On to the future! :-)

source:outline.text: January is archived, as is 2025. On to the future! :-)
